objective: Research and analyze the Central Transportation Hub (CPK) project in Poland - collect public information, verify sources, and produce comprehensive analysis
description: This is a demonstration investigation to test the Hybrid On-Prem Intelligence System. The goal is to research CPK using local LLM with local tools, supervised by Aleksander for quality assurance.

subtasks.description: Collect official information about CPK project from government sources
subtasks.success_criteria: At least 3 official government sources archived

subtasks.description: Collect news media coverage of CPK project
subtasks.success_criteria: At least 5 news articles from credible Polish media archived

subtasks.description: Extract key facts: timeline, budget, components, status
subtasks.success_criteria: Timeline of major milestones, budget figures, main project components identified
key_information_needed: What are main components (airport, railway, roads)?

subtasks.description: If budget/financial data found, perform statistical analysis
subtasks.success_criteria: Basic statistical analysis of any numerical data (budget changes, timeline changes, etc.)

supervisor_review_criteria: Key facts verified across multiple sources
Honest about what was found vs. not found

notes.purpose: Test hybrid system end-to-end: Local LLM execution + Aleksander supervision
notes.safety: CPK is public project, all information should be publicly available - no sensitive data
learning_objectives: Verify local LLM can use tools correctly

success_metrics.tool_usage: Appropriate tools used for each subtask
